## TxBuilder.deployScript() method

Deploys a script by creating a new UTxO with the script as its reference.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deployScript(script: Script, address?: Address): TxBuilder;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

script


</td><td>

[Script](./sdk.core.script.md)


</td><td>

The script to be deployed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

address


</td><td>

[Address](./sdk.core.address.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The address to lock the script to. Defaults to a burn address where the UTxO will be unspendable.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[TxBuilder](./sdk.txbuilder.md)

{<!-- -->TxBuilder<!-- -->} The same transaction builder.

## Example


```typescript
const myScript = Script.newPlutusV2Script(new PlutusV2Script("..."));
txBuilder.deployScript(myScript);
// or
txBuilder.deployScript(myScript, someAddress);
```
